titleStmt.title: The tenth vvorthy. Or, Several anagrams in Latine, Welsh, and English, upon the name of that most highly renowned worthy of worthies, Oliver late Lord Protector. Together with some elegeical verses upon his much lamented death, who dyed in body Sept. 3. 1658. And also more anagrams on his now Highness, and others of that most noble and puissant family.
titleStmt.author: Davyes, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Sad news by th' post, from Albion, doth me call,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
